thread.title: FCC proposes rules for faster 5G network
thread.title_full: FCC proposes rules for faster 5G network

title: FCC proposes rules for faster 5G network
text:
FCC proposes rules for faster 5G network 
Denver Post Sunday 25th October, 2015 
WASHINGTON - The Federal Communications Commission took initial steps to open a new wireless frontier on Thursday, proposing rules to encourage development of a bigger, faster fifth-generation, or 5G, network.The FCC action marks a small but significant advance toward the creation of the architecture that industry experts increasingly believe will be needed in years to come.That is partly because of the explosive growth in wireless traffic as more people buy smartphones. It is also because of a range of expected new uses for wireless communications, including the so-called Internet of things a...
